entry.title: WIND WARNING , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 7:48 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: ESE 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 7:43 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 6. Forecast issued 7:43 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 7:43 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
